snippet: Large portions of this season’s roster are expected to remain intact, with the new comedies  appearing next to franchises like “The Big Bang Theory” and “How I Met Your Mother.”
lead_paragraph: Large portions of this season’s roster are expected to remain intact, with the new comedies  appearing next to franchises like “The Big Bang Theory” and “How I Met Your Mother.”

headline.main: CBS’s Schedule Adds 4 Comedies, Each Guarded by a Successful One
